oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for ordinance stores issued to Capt. John Henry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Submitted by Capt. Henry of Co. E, 2nd Tenn. Cav. USA to Lt. Col. William F. Prosser, commanding the regiment, the form lists Burnside carbines, Merell's carbines, Colt revolvers, and various horse supplies. Condition is listed from "worn" to "unservice-; able." Capt. Henry organized Co. E at Sevierville (Tenn.) on September 16, 1862.
